php.LBL_EDIT: ویرایش موافقت نامه سطح خدمات SLA
php.LBL_CREATE: ایجاد موافقت نامه سطح خدمات SLA
php.LBL_AVAILABLE_FOR_RECORD_TIME_CALCULATIO: Available globally for record status time calculation
If this option is selected, the SLA policy will be available for calculating record status times even if the entry is not related to any SLA.
